text: Yemwe abemeye! Ntimukangize amaturo yanyu kubera incyuro n’inabi, nka wawundi utanga umutungo we kugira ngo yiyereke abantu, nta nemere Allah n’umunsi w’imperuka. Bityo urugero rwe ni nk’urutare rworosheho itaka, bityo imvuranyinshi yarugwaho ikarusiga rwanamye. Nta cyo bashobora guhemberwa mu byo bakoze, kandi Allah ntayobora abantu b’abahakanyi
